entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 17.
